Package xyz.veganslab.marcoromano.utils

Class WeightRescaler

java.lang.Object
xyz.veganslab.marcoromano.utils.WeightRescaler
@Component public class WeightRescaler extends Object
Provides functionality to rescale weight values based on a configuration-driven scale factor. Primarily used for converting weight values to a uniform scale in calculations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    WeightRescaler(DataFormatConfiguration dataFormatConfiguration)
    Constructs a WeightRescaler with a scale factor derived from the DataFormatConfiguration.

    Converts and rescales a weight value to an integer using the configured scale factor.
